mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM kit.event_view where image_num=1 ORDER BY event_cd DESC) A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1 ) list WHERE rnum >= #{value} AND rnum <=#{value}+4
SELECT * FROM kit.event_view where event_cd=#{value} and not image_num=1 ORDER BY event_cd DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM kit.event_view where image_num=1 and eventyn=#{yn} ORDER BY event_cd DESC) A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1 ) list WHERE rnum >= #{page} AND rnum <=#{page}+4
mapper.update: UPDATE kit.event SET recom_num=#{recom_num} WHERE event_cd=#{event_cd}
mapper.select: SELECT count(event_cd)as total, count(case when eventyn='y' then 1 end) as y, count(case when eventyn='n' then 1 end) as n from kit.event
